title: A Baby Blues Treasury: Wall-To-Wall Baby Blues
description: "One of the best things about Baby Blues is that it follows reality so closely that you're never quite sure whether Rick Kirkman and Jerry Scott are over the top or are merely excellent reporters." Oh, baby, it's Baby Blues ! Just when readers thought the MacPherson world was baby-proofed, cocreators Rick Kirkman and Jerry Scott flip up the toilet-training lid, throw open the kitchen cabinets, and drag the garden hose into the house with Wall-to-Wall Baby A Baby Blues Treasury.Baby Blues, of course, is the delightful internationally syndicated comic strip that depicts the adventures of the MacPherson Dad Darryl, Mom Wanda, and the three Zoe, Hammie, and newborn Wren. From games of Destroy the Legos to how to blow a two-year-old's nose with just one box of tissues, Baby Blues never fails to revel in the funny facts and fantasies about raising kids.Wall-to-Wall Baby A Baby Blues Treasury. represents a treasury of the best moments from three previous Kirkman and Scott collectionsâ€” Baby Unplugged , Dad to the Bone, and Never a Dry Moment.This combination of daily strips and full-color Sunday features delivers an array of hilarious family comedy. Wall-to-Wall Baby A Baby Blues Treasury. has young readers, parents, expectant parents, and grandparents nodding their heads in recognition of life in the MacPherson household. It's truly family fun for everyone in the family.
author: Rick Kirkman
